title: Understanding Firewalls
text: A firewall acts as a barrier between a trusted network and an untrusted network, like the internet. It helps protect the network by filtering traffic based on security rules.

hintAnswer: by monitoring and controlling incoming and outgoing network traffic based on predetermined security rules
title: Firewall Functionality
text: What is the primary function of a firewall in network security?
choices: by monitoring and controlling incoming and outgoing network traffic based on predetermined security rules
by encrypting all data within the network
by physically blocking access to network cables
